short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts your DOWNloads in the RIGHT location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts your DOWNloads in the RIGHT location. The extension will create sub-folders based on the file type to prevent dowloads folder from turning into trash can. Coming soon: Categorization based on download source.
